Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.transform.image.PixelTransform

  • Packages that use PixelTransform 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.canvas  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

    • Uses of PixelTransform in com.defano.jmonet.canvas

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.canvas with parameters of type PixelTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JMonetCanvas.transform(PixelTransform transform)
      Applies a PixelTransform on all the pixels of the image.

    • Uses of PixelTransform in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection with parameters of type PixelTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void TransformableImageSelection.transform(PixelTransform transform)
      Performs a per-pixel transformation on all pixels bound by the selection.

    • Uses of PixelTransform in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image with parameters of type PixelTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StaticImageTransformable.transform(PixelTransform transform)
      Applies a PixelTransform on all the pixels of the image.
      Constructors in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image with parameters of type PixelTransform 
      Constructor and Description
      ApplyPixelTransform(PixelTransform transform)
      Creates a transform that applies a PixelTransform to each pixel in the image.
      ApplyPixelTransform(PixelTransform transform, Shape mask)
      Creates a transform that applies a PixelTransform to each pixel that is contained within the bounds of the given shape.

    • Uses of PixelTransform in com.defano.jmonet.transform.pixel

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.transform.pixel that implement PixelTransform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BrightnessPixelTransform
      Modifies the brightness (luminosity) of each affected pixel by adding/subtracting a delta value to each color channel of an affected pixel.
      class  InvertPixelTransform
      Inverts the color value of each affected pixel.
      class  RemoveAlphaPixelTransform
      Saturates the alpha channel of any pixel that is not fully transparent or fully opaque (has no effect on fully opaque or fully transparent pixels).
      class  TransparencyPixelTransform
      Adjusts the level of transparency (alpha) in each affected pixel.
